ygData.subject: RE: [rest-discuss] RESTful Queues
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, if I had read the article properly I might have copied the first part of the protocol correctly. Producer ======== request POST /queue response HTTP 201

Sorry, if I had read the article properly I might
have copied the first part of the protocol correctly.

Producer
========
request
		POST /queue
response
		HTTP 201 Created
    		Location: /queue/123456789
request
		POST /queue/123456789
		<message content>
response
		HTTP 200 OK



Another variation would be:

Producer
========
request
		POST /queue
response
		HTTP 200 OK
    		Location: /queue/123456789
request
		PUT /queue/123456789
		<message content>
response
		HTTP 201 Created

If the PUT was unsuccessful this sequence does not 
create an empty placeholder on the queue.
I prefer PUT over POST for the second part as the PUT
can be repeated if the transmission was interupted.

Donald.

> 
> Producer
> ========
> request
> 		POST /queue/next
> response
> 		HTTP 200 OK
>     		<queue next="/queue/123456789"/>
> request
> 		PUT /queue/123456789
> 		<message content>
> response
> 		HTTP 201 Created
